ack.p: We would like to thank to the National ECDC Correspondents in Western Balkan countries: Silvia Bino, National Institute of Public Health, Albania; Dušan Kojić, Ministry of Civil Affairs of Bosnia and Herzegovina; Lul Raka, National Institute of Public Health, Kosovo, Boban Mugoša, National Institute of Public Health, Montenegro; Goran Stevanovic, National Institute of Public Health, Serbia, Shaban Memeti, National Institute of Public Health, the former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia.
